title: Pitchfork
content:
Pitchfork Common 1~6 Damage 1d6 Piercing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A farming tool crafted from mismatched branches, held together by fraying twine. Spear Two-Handed 1.35 16

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A farming tool crafted from mismatched branches, held together by fraying twine.

Spear Two-Handed

Pitchfork is one of the Spear Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable
